title: "Lessons Learned from Self-Selection Reteaming at Redgate"
excerpt: "Redgate Software runs a yearly deliberate reteaming process across engineering to alter how they invest the efforts of teams and encourage people to move towards the work they find most engaging. Self-selection reteaming is an effective and empowering method of aligning with company goals."
